levels.description:
Attack Range <@ba.vup>changes</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, Attack Interval <@ba.vup>greatly reduces</>, and normal attacks now deal AoE damage; if target is under the burst effect of <$ba.dt.burning2>Burn damage</>, deals an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Elemental Damage
<@ba.rem>Loses {lose_hp_scale:0%} of Max HP every second; skill activation grants {attack@trigger_time} ammo, and whenever an enemy enters the burst effect of <$ba.dt.burning2>Burn damage</>, gains {ammo_recover} additional ammo; skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>
